page.title: 02EDUCATION -THE LOCAL SCHOOL
page.content: Named after a part of the village of Penrhyndeudraeth,{YSGOL CEFN COCH}is situated near the centre on a one way street called School Street just off the High Street. Next to the school is a library and behind is a sports field and open ground. The school has 17 rooms including toilets,7 classrooms,a music room and the library which is located in the Nobel Room which is named after the inventor of dynamite.This is produced at the local I.C.I. works.The school has a hall,used for religious services,concerts and P.E..There are cloakrooms for the infants and juniors,a staffroom and a storeroom.Heating is by an oil fired_boiler which heats water that circulates the school.
